name: Drakosha "Dragon Shooter"
description: Take control of Drakosha and guide him through various obstacles in this fast paced side scrolling shooter adventure. Encounter different enemies on the ground and in the air. Dodge incoming rocks, avoid red eggs and collect yellow ones to gain extra points. Pick up power ups and face off against a mighty boss. Accumulate score as you fly in this beautifully animated fantasy world of 10 levels.
